about_the_game:
Clash of Magic is a tower rush game for true RTS fans from the eSports community because it offers a deep and complex strategic experience. The game requires planning and skill to excel in its fierce summoning duels. You will immerse yourself into the role of a student at the Academy of Witchcraft and Wizardry. There, you will face a series of campaigns to learn spells and summons, then challenge each other in the Arena for the title of the Grandmaster Witch or Wizard.

It is a seriously fun, interactive, and competitive game where your goal is to battle other summoners in realtime, or to beat the campaign full of challenges. The game features:

PVP Arena
PVE Campaign
Leaderboard: PVP
Bit Awards XR Game of the Year in 2017



Practice daily. Test your skills in PVP. Get on the leaderboards! Become a legendary wizard!

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD RX470 or greater

short_description: On the United Island of Magic, there is an Academy of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Students with magic powers, regardless of their ethnicity and background, can apply to this university. The acceptance rate is lower than Harvard.
